text: This Chinese article introduces lots of different colours.每天出门的时候，大家会看到各种各样的颜色。绿色的大树和小草，红色的小花，白色的云，蓝蓝的天空，以及灰色，白色，黑色的车子。这些颜色都很漂亮，让我们感觉很高兴。Everytime we go outside, people can see all kinds of different colours.Green trees and grass, red flowers, white clouds, a blue sky as well as grey, white or black cars.These colours are all very beautiful, they make us feel happy.1 – 天空是什么颜色？a. 蓝色b. 绿色c. 粉色d. 橘色2 – 云是什么颜色？a. 蓝色b. 绿色c. 白色d. 棕色1. a2. cReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
